biotools.summary:
A Python package for multi-variate Thermodynamics-based Flux Analysis.

We present multiTFA, a multivariate thermodynamics-based metabolic flux analysis package for Python. The framework takes advantage of the reactions' Gibbs free energy covariance matrix to tightly constrain metabolic models using thermodynamic constraints. It represents an improvement over a previous thermodynamic metabolic flux analysis (tMFA) method.

bioschemas.name: multiTFA
